name: "Magnum P.I." Season Six DVD Quiz | Magnum P.I. | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who mentioned Icepick's full name during a conversation in "This Island Isn't Big Enough"?
questions.explanation:
Carol.

	Carol told T.C., Magnum, and Higgins that Frances Hoffstedder was helping her investigate Rick's disappearance. When Higgins asked who Frances Hoffstedder was, Carol informed them of Icepick's real name.

questions.text: Higgins' dog, Apollo, was shot in a botched robbery attempt of Robin's Nest in "All Thieves On Deck".
questions.explanation:
True.

	Magnum found it amusing that Higgins could read Zeus' frantic barks until they found that Apollo had been shot during a botched robbery attempt of Robin's Nest.  The episode title "All Thieves On Deck" was the name of the book the ship's captain was writing for Magnum to give to Robin Masters.

questions.text: In "The Hotel Dick", who acted as the house detective for the Hawaiian Gardens hotel?
questions.explanation:
Magnum.

	Magnum acted as the house detective for two weeks as a way to make some money and catch a hotel thief.

questions.text: T.C. and his girlfriend, Donna, had to share their one million dollar winnings with Doc Ibold, Kika, Rick, Sergeant Tanaka and who else if they won "The Treasure of Kalaniopu'u"?
questions.explanation:
Carol.

	A book that Robin Masters wrote was the topic of a treasure hunt that sent Hawaii into a frenzy to figure out the clues and find the one million dollars buried somewhere in Oahu.

questions.text: Magnum revealed to Rick in "I Never Wanted To Go To France, Anyway" that he ran away to join the circus when he was fourteen.
questions.explanation:
False.

	While helping work security at a circus, Rick revealed to Magnum that he loved a circus and even ran away to join one. When his father found him, he spanked Rick for running away.

questions.text: What was the name of Robin Masters' London home in "Deja Vu"?
questions.explanation:
Robin's Keep.

	Robin Masters owned several homes in different countries. He used his name in each one of the property titles. At Robin's Keep in London, Magnum and Higgins were trying to set the house up with good security and a counterpart to Higgins' job in Hawaii.

questions.text: What body part did Magnum injure in "Who is Don Luis Higgins And Why Is He Doing These Horrible Things To Me"?
questions.explanation:
Leg.

	Magnum revealed to the audience that he injured his leg while playing a game called "Over the line" with TC and Rick at Robin's Nest. During the episode, everyone kept asking Magnum how he injured his leg. Higgins' brother, Don Luis, even asked Magnum if he had one leg shorter than the other, and Allan Johnson questioned if his leg was injured during the war.

questions.text: What city was Rick in when he won one million dollars in "A Little Bit of Luck, A Little Bit of Grief"?
questions.explanation:
Albuquerque.

	Rick was in Albuquerque, New Mexico on business. While there, he won one million dollars. He spent all but four hundred and twenty thousand dollars of it and that was lost after the briefcase was thrown out a window and carried away on a produce truck.

questions.text: In the sixth season finale titled "Photo Play", Magnum was being awarded by Agatha for saving what animal?
questions.explanation:
Cat.

	Agatha was part of a cat lover's association. When she heard that Magnum saved a cat that was stuck in a tide pool, she awarded him the cat lover of the month award. His speech went perfectly fine until he told the group about a game he used to play by sliding his cat across the kitchen floor.

questions.text: In a deeply moving episode properly titled "Going Home", Magnum returned home to Virginia for his grandfather's funeral. In the episode, his half-brother's name was mentioned several times. What was his half-brother's first name?
questions.explanation:
Joey.

	Magnum ragged on his stepfather's bullish attitude for causing his half-brother, Joey, to run away. His mother told him Joey ran away because he wanted to be just like his big brother Thomas. In the final scene of "Going Home", Magnum walked the Wall in Washington and stopped at Joey's name inscribed on the wall.
